comment: She's a really great teacher with an awesome personality. Seems to really care about her students. Attendance is a big part of your grade so don't skip her class. Overall an amazing amazing teacher.

She's very friendly. Initially her assignments are easy "A"s but as the semester goes on her standards for earning a "A"s become increasingly more rigorous.  She's very personable and easy to talk to. She enjoys lively and respectful academic debates. She is fond of diversity, and of differing opinions. She's also very easy on the eyes.
She was a great teacher! Made the class so interesting. Showing up is up to you but I would not recommend missing her lesson since she doesnt really goes by the textbook. Very understanding also.
Awesome Prof. Made Human Origins as interesting as possible. Exams can be tough but they were all online!

I loved her! I attended class maybe half the time, and when I did she was super helpful about the material. She understands that we have lives outside of class, so communicating with her makes things 10x easier on yourself. Her quizzes and exams are online, but they're still challenging. Definitely recommend!

Best teacher I've had in college hands down. Took her for Human Sexuality. She's hilarious and down to Earth. Very clear style and makes it relevant. I don't like school and her class made me ove being a student. Her quizzes and tests are online. No homework. There's a research paper but it's a piece of cake. If only every class could go this well!

AWESOME TEACHER! absolutely entertaining, keeps you on your toes and does a good lecture! Definitely a perfect teacher to be teaching the fun topics of human sexuality. class isn't mandatory. quizzes and test were online and they aren't too hard, but will challenge you. Always requires a research paper. TAKE HER!!!

Amazing teacher.  Test and quizzes are all open notes so be sure to go to class cause that's the only way to get the notes.  She realizes that this is an intro class so she doesn't try to make you work that hard in it.  Also she is very energetic and an awesome person in general.

If you come to class and make the effort, it's easy to pass. Just DON'T MISS LAB DAYS. She challenges you to think, is clear in her instructions and expectations, and is very approachable - such a brilliant, quirky personality, too! Really a good person. She is without a doubt the best professor I've had, and perhaps will ever have.

Not only shes hot but shes such a nerd! lol which is AWESOME! Easy class easy A. Not only that but she made everything easy for us to understand, she doesn't read from the power point or notes, shes enthusiastic to teach! We need more like her! TAKE HER CLASS

Tucker has been the best professor I have ever taken.  I first took her intro class and her enthusiasm about ANTH rubbed off on me so much that I changed my major after that class and took her 4 more times.   She knows how to relate to students and has helped me out more than once.  You will get the most out of ANTH from this professor.
Very smart and eager to help. Loved.

I absolutely love this professor! She is energetic, spunky, and ready to share all she knows about Anthropology. Because this is an entry level course, she makes it easy and fun. Quizzes/tests are open note/open book which is awesome. She presents the material so it is understandable and stress free. Take her!

Meg is as perfect as professors come, honestly. She's friendly, knowledgeable, and extremely clear. GO TO CLASS AND TAKE NOTES. All of her quizzes and tests are open book, open notes. I really didn't need the book because her notes were so precise, and her questions come from her notes. The university requires her to assign a textbook.

Great teacher and hot! Go to class to receive notes as that's the only way to get them and to take the pop quizzes, which are every chapter. The first half of the semester they were all open book and second half they were still open book and she even gave a lot of answers. A midterm and final online and those are all the grades. Super cool teacher

She is hilarious and very clear.  However, be careful not to get distracted by her humorous outlook on the class. She does take the class seriously.  She does open note, open book quizzes so those are easy. Just make sure to take down all of the power point notes.  there is a long essay that you have to do at some point in the class but its not bad

She is very enthusiastic about the material and it makes it much easier to grasp since it's always entertaining to watch her talk about it. Not to mention she's easy on the eyes.. To sum up, knowledgeable professor who is very approachable and engaging. Several open note quizzes. Two online tests. One term paper of your choosing. Take notes.

Easy class. She's straightforward and quirky. She knows what she's talking about and gives examples you understand. Interesting class. Two tests, both online so open book and notes are ok. Attendance isn't mandatory but there are pop quizzes. Quizzes 1st half are open note, afterwards they are closed note. I love her and would take her again.

Easiest class ever. I attend class about once every 2 weeks to catch up on notes. There are 2 tests that are online and if you have the notes, you'll ace the test. There are pop quizzes, but they are super easy and aren't worth much of your grade. From beginning to end, she lectures and the class is really boring, but its an easy A!
Greatest professor.

She was awesome! It was a really easy class, as long as you attended your lectures you knew everything on the test. the tests were really clear and direct. There's not much work involved in the class.

Really cool and pretty professor! Not as easy as I expected from all the other ratings, though. Half the quizzes are open-note, the other half are not. She does not post notes online so you need to come to class. Exams are online, though. I got an A, and it's pretty easy but you still need to put in effort.

Easy fun, and engertic. You dont have to learn the materail just how up and pay some attention. All test are online. First half of the class all quizes are open note open book.If you need Anthroploy I would highly recommend her. No interst in this class at all and it will still be one of the easiest As I ve had in college.

Easiest college-level course I have ever taken. She gives lectures, but most of the questions can be answered if you read the book. Open note midterm and quizzes. She was super friendly and knew that people were taking the class as a prereq. Not recommended for anthropology majors that want to learn. Recommended for slackers, haha.

Tucker is relatively easy. You have to be in class everyday to take notes, and she talks pretty quickly. Her quizzes are open note until about the end of the semester, but they are relatively easy as well. GREAT teacher, makes you think in a different perspective. RECOMMENDED!

She is very specific with requirements and enthusiastic about the subject. She grades fairly and is very personable. I looked forward to the next class period (can't believe I just said that). Made a B+

Wonderful teacher! She knows exactly what she is talking about and is very helpful if you have any questions. Attend class because she tells you exactly what will be on the tests and quizzes. Easy A, you have to try to fail this class.

Great professor and very enthusiastic about the course. She makes classes interesting and the tests and quizzes are extremely easy. Attendance is not mandatory but she tells you exactly whats going to be on the tests so if you takes notes you will not need the book. I would definitely recommend taking her.

I loved her class! Very knowledgeable and enthusiastic about her subject, and always has a rebuttal for the book she used. Never boring. One of the few classes I felt I got something out of. Always easy to talk to. Doesn't try to trick you on her quizzes or tests. I recommend taking notes on your laptop, or getting a recorder.

fair very nice. Multiple choice tests, no trick questions. She grades the current events fairly, but seems a little too critical..commenting as i it were a research paper. She knows her stuff and is enthusiastic. Highly recommend.
10 quizzes drops the lowest may let you use your notes. two tests a midterm and final, if your class is nice she may put it online and you can use your book. passed this class with an A.
